On 8/3/10 9:23 PM, HyuuGaBaDita wrote:
> Hi. I am newbie in using Heritrix! I thk Heritrix is fantastic and
> helping me a lot! I am currently using heritrix-1.14.3. I am facing
> some problems:
>
> 1.Everytimes when I login, it requires me to key in the Login name
> and password, can I avoid this by pre-setting the USername and
> password? how?

Usually a web browser will offer an option to remember login credentials.

> 2.where can i set the depth level? please guide me.

In the default-deciding example profile, the TooManyHopsDecideRule, and 
its 'max-hops' setting, sets a ceiling on the number of links followed 
from your starting seeds.

> 3.Can heritrix dopwnload more than 1 website? how? what is the
> maximumn num of websites can be archived at a time

The maximum is limited only by your storage; just enter the right 
starting seed URIs, and configure the scope so it proceeds to any other 
related sites of interest, and you're on your way.

- Gordon @ IA
